attributes.action: Freedom of speech in the UK - Jeremy Clarkson should not be punished
attributes.additional_details: Don't punish someone for saying his/her opinion in public or in the media. Everybody should have freedom of speech. Jeremy Clarkson should not be punished for telling his opinion in the media.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the BBC.

It is a long-standing principle that the Government does not interfere in programme matters. It is important to maintain the principle of freedom of expression which political interference could undermine.
